title: Herbs and Natural Products
cleaned_text: Herbs and Natural Products - Name - Herbs and Natural Products - Accession Number - DBCAT003727 - Description Not Available - Drugs Drug Drug Description [St. John's Wort](/drugs/DB01323) An herbal ingredient used in non-prescription therapeutic products for the short-term treatment of minor skin irritations, insomnia, depression, and anxiety. [Ephedra sinica root](/drugs/DB01363) An alpha and beta-adrenergic agonist used for the management of respiratory conditions related to bronchial asthma, such as wheezing, shortness of breath, and tightness of chest. [Ephedrine](/drugs/DB01364) An alpha and beta-adrenergic agonist indicated to treat hypotension under anesthesia, allergic conditions, bronchial asthma, and nasal congestion. [Ginseng](/drugs/DB01404) A herbal supplement used in many health products. [Iodine](/drugs/DB05382) An ingredient of nutritional supplements that is also used for disinfection. [Ginger](/drugs/DB10344) An extract from Ginger used in allergy testing. [Garlic](/drugs/DB10532) An extract from Garlic used in allergy testing. [Papaya](/drugs/DB10658) An extract from Papaya used in allergy testing. [Peppermint](/drugs/DB10984) An extract from Peppermint used in allergy testing. [Plantago seed](/drugs/DB11097) An ingredient used in a variety of natural health products. [Allantoin](/drugs/DB11100) An ingredient used in skin care products to relieve irritation and protect minor cuts, scrapes, and burns. [Peppermint oil](/drugs/DB11198) An ingredient used in a variety of natural health products and is not an approved medication. [Sennosides](/drugs/DB11365) A laxative used to treat constipation. [Valerian](/drugs/DB13196) A plant used in some non-prescription natural health products. [Passiflora incarnata flower](/drugs/DB13974) A herbal product indicated in the treatment of stress, nervousness, anxiety, irritability, and trouble sleeping. [Black cohosh](/drugs/DB13975) A herbal product indicated in the symptomatic treatment of menopause. [Hops](/drugs/DB10687) An extract from Hops used in allergy testing. [Bilberry](/drugs/DB14235) Annotated alba bark is a plant/plant extract used in some OTC (over-the-counter) products. It is not an approved drug. [Eleuthero](/drugs/DB14303) Eleuthero is a plant/plant extract used in some OTC (over-the-counter) products. It is not an approved drug. [Saw palmetto](/drugs/DB14360) Saw palmetto is a plant/plant extract used in some OTC (over-the-counter) products. It is not an approved drug. [Milk thistle](/drugs/DB14375) Milk thistle is a plant/plant extract used in some OTC (over-the-counter) products. It is not an approved drug. [Salvia miltiorrhiza root](/drugs/DB14337) Salvia miltiorrhiza root is a plant/plant extract used in some OTC (over-the-counter) products. It is not an approved drug. [Willow bark](/drugs/DB14691) Not Annotated [Racephedrine](/drugs/DB14752) Not Annotated [Levomenthol](/drugs/DB00825) An organic compound used to treat mild to moderate muscle and joint pain. [Echinacoside](/drugs/DB15488) A phenylethanoid glycoside plant isolate currently being investigated for anti-apoptotic and neuroprotective effects. [Pine needle oil (pinus mugo)](/drugs/DB11276) Pine needle oil is obtained from the needles of Pinus mugo tree via steam distillation. Major components of pine ingredient used in a variety of natural health products. - Drugs & Drug Targets
